page.title: 05Where Great Brickhill works.
page.content: We have found out which routes most people who live in Great Brickhill take to go to work from the village. The most popular route to work is towards the A5 in the North then through the nearest major town which is Bletchley.The second most popular route is towards the A5 through Little Brickhill. Next people travel towards Leighton Buzzard past the Three Locks. The next most popular route is through Heath and Reach. When we did our survey 92 people did not reply and we found 38 people worked in Great Brickhill. 17 were not working and 60 had retired.
